text: ‘numbala kriya karanu. evita allah da, ohuge dharmadutayanan ha deva visvasavantayin da numbalage kriyavan dakinu æta. tavada drsyamanaya ha adrsyamanaya danna veta numbala nævata yomu karanu labanu æta. evita numbala sidu karamin siti dæ pilibanda numbalata ohu danvanu ætæ’yi (nabivaraya !) numba pavasanu
